title: Which network marketing company should I join in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: no body can say which company u can join because in market many company working now days, but u need to take care of following things.. company work in India according to guideline of Indian govt,company product should be good quality wise and usable for customer.company compensation plan effective, training and system should be good.who already work on company people growing or not financially,any network marketing no required registration amount,company must follow some ethics and values

A company that is legal in network marketing and is stable in the future and in which you get good environment. Where you get such knowledge that you can start unique business in the future. You can watch this videos for more information
